name: Cardgames Deluxe
overview: You can choose three difficulty levels, 2 score systems with or without timer, 11 games (Klondike, Quatro, Findit, Memory, Freecell, Pyramid, Spider, Hanoi, Golf, Canfield, Agnes), background colors, selection colors, play out of game music, choose cardsets and tunes, save your presets and make your own cardsets with this version. There are over 750 cardsets created for this game in circulation.
